sentences.sContent: Her body was found dumped in a derelict warehouse less than a mile from her home.
sentences.sCn: 她的尸体被发现丢在离她家不到一英里的一座废弃的仓库里。

synos.tran: 玩忽职守的；无主的；被抛弃了的
遗弃物；玩忽职守者；被遗弃的人

remMethod.val: de + re(向后) + lict(=linqu留下) → 完全置后 → 被遗弃的人

trans.tranCn: 荒废的；玩忽职守的；疏忽的
trans.tranOther: a derelict building or piece of land is in very bad condition because it has not been used for a long time
